properties.property: select ID_, REV_, CATEGORY_, NAME_, KEY_, VERSION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, RESOURCE_NAME_, DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, HAS_START_FORM_KEY_, SUSPENSION_STATE_ from act_re_procdef where DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = ?
select a.* from act_re_procdef a inner join (select KEY_, max(VERSION_) maxv from act_re_procdef where KEY_ = ? group by KEY_) b on a.KEY_ = b.KEY_ and a.VERSION_ = b.maxv
select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < (select version_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = ?)
update act_ru_task set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?)
update act_ru_execution set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?)
update act_ru_job set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?)
update act_ru_identitylink set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?)
update act_hi_taskinst set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?) and END_TIME_ is null
update act_hi_procinst set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?) and END_TIME_ is null
update act_hi_actinst set PROC_DEF_ID_ = ? where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?) and END_TIME_ is null

select ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, BUSINESS_KEY_, PROC_DEF_ID_, START_TIME_, END_TIME_, DURATION_, START_USER_ID_, START_ACT_ID_, END_ACT_ID_, SUPER_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID_, DELETE_REASON_ from act_hi_procinst where PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select id_ from act_re_procdef where key_ = ? and version_ < ?) and END_TIME_ is null

select * from (select a.TASK_DEF_KEY_/**,END_TIME_*/ from ACT_HI_TASKINST a inner join (select PROC_INST_ID_,id_ from ACT_HI_TASKINST where id_ = ?) d on a.PROC_INST_ID_ = d.PROC_INST_ID_ where d.id_ <> a.ID_ and a.END_TIME_ is not null order by a.END_TIME_ desc) where rownum = 1

select * from (select a.TASK_DEF_KEY_/**,END_TIME_*/ from ACT_HI_TASKINST a inner join (select PROC_INST_ID_,id_,task_def_key_ from ACT_HI_TASKINST where id_ = ?) d on a.PROC_INST_ID_ = d.PROC_INST_ID_ where d.id_ <> a.ID_ and a.END_TIME_ is not null and d.task_def_key_ <> a.task_def_key_ order by a.END_TIME_ desc) where rownum = 1

select a.TASK_DEF_KEY_/**,END_TIME_*/ from ACT_HI_TASKINST a inner join (select PROC_INST_ID_,id_ from ACT_HI_TASKINST where id_ = ?) d on a.PROC_INST_ID_ = d.PROC_INST_ID_ where d.id_ <> a.ID_ and a.END_TIME_ is not null order by a.END_TIME_ desc limit 0,1

select a.TASK_DEF_KEY_/**,END_TIME_*/ from ACT_HI_TASKINST a inner join (select PROC_INST_ID_,id_,task_def_key_ from ACT_HI_TASKINST where id_ = ?) d on a.PROC_INST_ID_ = d.PROC_INST_ID_ where d.id_ <> a.ID_ and a.END_TIME_ is not null and d.task_def_key_ <> a.task_def_key_ order by a.END_TIME_ desc limit 0,1
select PROC_DEF_ID_,TASK_DEF_KEY_ from act_hi_taskinst t where id_ = ?
select * from td_wf_rejectlog t where newtaskid = ? and optype=?
insert into td_wf_rejectlog(rejectnode,rejecttaskid,newtaskid,optype,PROCESS_ID) values(?,?,?,?,?)
select TEXT_ from ACT_RU_VARIABLE where PROC_INST_ID_ = ? and NAME_ = ?

INSERT INTO TD_WF_HI_REJECTLOG ( NEWTASKID, REJECTTASKID, REJECTNODE, OPTYPE, PROCESS_ID, BACKUPTIME) ( SELECT NEWTASKID, REJECTTASKID, REJECTNODE, OPTYPE, PROCESS_ID,#[backuptime] FROM TD_WF_REJECTLOG T WHERE T.PROCESS_ID = #[processId])
delete from td_wf_rejectlog where PROCESS_ID=?

INSERT INTO td_wf_copytask ( ID, COPERTYPE, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, ACT_ID, act_name, act_instid, tasktype ) VALUES ( #[id], #[copertype], #[coper], #[process_id], #[process_key], #[businesskey], #[copytime], #[act_id], #[act_name], #[act_instid], #[tasktype])
select * from td_wf_copytask where ID=?

#if($orgs && $orgs.size()>0) select t.* from ( select ID, COPERTYPE, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, ACT_ID , act_name , act_instid,tasktype from td_wf_copytask where COPER=#[user] and COPERTYPE=0 -- 用户抄送 #if($process_key && !$process_key.equals("")) and PROCESS_KEY = #[process_key] #end #if($businesskey && !$businesskey.equals("")) and BUSINESSKEY = #[businesskey] #end union all select ID, COPERTYPE, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, ACT_ID , act_name , act_instid,tasktype from td_wf_copytask orgcopy where orgcopy.COPER in ( #foreach($org in $orgs) #if($foreach.index == 0) #[orgs[$foreach.index]] #else ,#[orgs[$foreach.index]] #end #end ) and not exists (select u.COPER from td_wf_copytask u where u.COPER=#[user] and u.COPERTYPE=0 and orgcopy.act_instid=u.act_instid) and not exists (select hiu.COPER from td_wf_hi_copytask hiu where hiu.COPER=#[user] and orgcopy.act_instid=hiu.act_instid) and orgcopy.COPERTYPE=1 -- 机构抄送 #if($process_key && !$process_key.equals("")) and PROCESS_KEY = #[process_key] #end #if($businesskey && !$businesskey.equals("")) and BUSINESSKEY = #[businesskey] #end ) t ORDER by t.COPYTIME desc #else select ID, COPERTYPE, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, ACT_ID , act_name , act_instid,tasktype from td_wf_copytask where COPER=#[user] and COPERTYPE=0 -- 用户抄送 #if($process_key && !$process_key.equals("")) and PROCESS_KEY = #[process_key] #end #if($businesskey && !$businesskey.equals("")) and BUSINESSKEY = #[businesskey] #end ORDER by COPYTIME desc #end

select ID, COPERTYPE, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, ACT_ID , act_name , act_instid,tasktype from td_wf_copytask where 1=1 #if($process_key && !$process_key.equals("")) and PROCESS_KEY = #[process_key] #end #if($businesskey && !$businesskey.equals("")) and BUSINESSKEY = #[businesskey] #end ORDER by COPYTIME desc

select ID, copyid, COPORG, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, READTIME, ACT_ID, act_name, act_instid, COPERCNName,tasktype from td_wf_hi_copytask where act_instid=? and COPER is not null ORDER by READTIME asc

select ID, copyid, COPORG, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, READTIME, ACT_ID, act_name, act_instid, COPERCNName,tasktype from td_wf_hi_copytask where 1=1 #if(!$isAdmin) and COPER=#[user] #end #if($process_key && !$process_key.equals("")) and PROCESS_KEY = #[process_key] #end #if($businesskey && !$businesskey.equals("")) and BUSINESSKEY = #[businesskey] #end ORDER by READTIME asc
select COPERCNName from td_wf_hi_copytask where act_instid=? ORDER by READTIME asc
select COPERCNName from td_wf_hi_copytask where act_instid=? ORDER by READTIME asc limit 0,?
select tt1.* from ( select COPERCNName from td_wf_hi_copytask where act_instid=? ORDER by READTIME asc) tt1 where rownum <= (?+1)
delete from td_wf_copytask where ID=?

INSERT INTO td_wf_hi_copytask ( ID, copyid, COPORG, COPER, PROCESS_ID, PROCESS_KEY, BUSINESSKEY, COPYTIME, READTIME, ACT_ID, act_name, act_instid, COPERCNName, tasktype ) VALUES ( #[id], #[copyid], #[coperorg], #[coper], #[process_id], #[process_key], #[businesskey], #[copytime], #[readtime], #[act_id], #[act_name], #[act_instid], #[coperCNName], #[tasktype] )
select count(1) from td_wf_hi_copytask where act_instid=? and coper=?
